full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### RFP: Nelson Regional District Office Renovation
###### Reference Number: CB-369-38733112

#### Brief Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites contractors to submit a bid for the renovation of the Nelson Regional District Office building, located at 1010 Second Street, Nelson, BC. The renovation project includes a mix of selective demolition, infrastructure upgrades, and office space alterations.

#### Objectives and Scope
The contractor will be responsible for:
* Upgrading the building's HVAC system
* Renovating the FIS and Exhibits space, including the construction of new walls and installation of secure doors
* Modifying office spaces, secure storage areas, and examination rooms
* Performing selective demolition and renovations as required by the project

#### Project Location and Timeline
The project will be executed at the Nelson Regional District Office building, located at 1010 Second Street, Nelson, BC. The notice and tender closing dates are specified below.

#### Tender Information
*   ##### Publication Date:
    2024-03-27
*   ##### Tender Closing Date:
    2024-04-16 at 5:00 PM (Pacific Time)
*   ##### Regions of Opportunity:
    World
*   ##### Regions of Delivery:
    British Columbia

#### Evaluation Criteria
The contractor will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Language of Bid Documents
Bid documents are available in both English and French. Any amendments to the project scope will be posted on the Canada Buys website.

#### Contact Information
Luba Vinnitsky  
 Phone: (778) 290-2969  
 Email: Luba.vinnitsky@rcmp-grc.gc.ca  
 Address: 14200 Green Timbers Way, Surrey, BC, V3T 6P3

To access relevant documents and bid electronically, visit the Canada Buys website.
